changelog.metadescription: KoolAutoComplete is excellent PHP Ajax AutoComplete. Flexible rendering, elegant behavior together with Ajax Load On-Demand have made KoolAutoComplete the great choice to replace limited auto-complete provided by browsers.
changelog.metakeywords: php ajax autocomplete, php autocomplete, php ajax autosuggest, php autosuggest
changelog.log: - Fix client-side issue with MoolTools. - Fix the "repeated dates" issue happening when timezone is changed.
- Fix opening issue when working with KoolGrid.
- Fix the date parsing error in IE
- Fix the issue that KoolCalendar parse date wrongly. - Remove the ViewSelector in KoolDateTimePicker - Fix the Localization of KoolDateTimePicker and of KoolDatePicker
- Enhance the date parsing function. - Add the $Localization to KoolDateTimePicker - Improve the animation functions.
- Fix the issue related to date conversion of KoolDateTimePicker
- Enhance client-side events. - Adding new properties at server-side: ExpandAnimation, CollapseAnimation. - Provide better way to handle selecting date.
